Uses of Interface
org.opensha2.gmm.ScalarGroundMotion

  • Packages that use ScalarGroundMotion 
    Package Description
    org.opensha2.gmm
    Provides implementations of all GroundMotionModels used in the 2008 and 2014 USGS National Seismic Hazard Models.

    • Uses of ScalarGroundMotion in org.opensha2.gmm

      Classes in org.opensha2.gmm that implement ScalarGroundMotion 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultScalarGroundMotion
      Default wrapper for ground motion prediction equation (GMPE) results.
